sentences.en: a house set in idyllic surroundings
sentences.cn: 在田园风光的环境中的房子

sentences.en: And then by car sent to the idyllic resorts at sea.
sentences.cn: 然后由专车送至海上田园度假村.

sentences.en: Don't you think that sounds idyllic?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得那听起来很富有诗情画意 吗 ?

sentences.en: I don't mind a bit of idiosyncrasy, but that strange ideology you believe in , coupled with your idyllic ideas on life, suggest to me that all you're doing is looking for some idol to follow.
sentences.cn: 你有一点特殊的癖性我不在乎，但你相信的那种奇怪的意识形态，加上你向往田园诗般生活的想法，给我的印象是你在做的就是要找到一个偶像来效仿。

sentences.en: I saw before me an idyllic life.
sentences.cn: 展现在我眼前的是充满诗情画意的生活。

sentences.en: It appears to be an idyllic domestic set-up.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是一种田园诗般的家庭组成格局。

sentences.en: It was an attractive hope that the high technology of our society might be wrested from the grip of benighted forces and used to restore us to an idyllic natural state.
sentences.cn: 人类社会的高科技可能将我们自愚昧势力的控制之中拯救出来，并重建一个田园诗般的自然状态，这曾是一个有吸引力的愿景。
这是一种牧歌式的构想.

sentences.en: Like the idyllic life, music, reading clip newspaper, good cooking, travel.
sentences.cn: 喜欢田园生活, 音乐 、 阅读剪报, 美食烹饪, 旅行.

sentences.en: Many people living in big cities yearn for an idyllic country life.
sentences.cn: 现在的很多都市人向往那种田园化的生活.

sentences.en: Married life was not as idyllic as he had imagined.
sentences.cn: 婚姻生活并不像他想象的那么浪漫美好。

sentences.en: Of the ordinary, idyllic society that we all took for granted.
sentences.cn: 对于大众来说，这就是我们习以为常的田园诗般的社会。

sentences.en: On this breezy idyllic retreat , 36 beachfront bungalows nestle amidst lush vegetation.
sentences.cn: 在这个清风微拂恬淡怡人的去处, 36座海滨别墅坐落在枝叶繁茂的草木间.

sentences.en: Rosie's idyllic world came to an abrupt end when her parents' marriage broke up.
sentences.cn: 父母婚姻的破裂使得罗茜田园诗般美好的世界陡然画上了句号。

sentences.en: Some believe that lemurians were much more like early humans living in a sort of idyllic paradise largely agrarian with lush forests and an abundance of flowers and fruit trees.
sentences.cn: 一些就相信利莫里亚更加像早期的人类，生活在一种田园诗般的天堂里，主要地与繁荣的森林，盛开的花朵和结果的树在一起。

sentences.en: These scenes had an idyllic air.
sentences.cn: 这种情景多少有点田园气氛.

sentences.en: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.cn: 这充满诗意的田园景色只是画面的一角.

sentences.en: To an outsider this looks like an idyllic life.
sentences.cn: 在局外人看来这好像是一种田园式的生活.

sentences.en: Tucked away in our subconsciousness is an idyllic vision.
sentences.cn: 我们的潜意识里藏着一派田园诗般的风光!

trans.tran_cn: 田园诗般的，牧歌的，质朴宜人的，平和欢畅的
